member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult
member.summary: A base class for all Hawaii service result classes. Various Hawaii service result classes will represent the result corresponding to different type of Hawaii service calls. This class contains functionality common to all Hawaii service result classes.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceResult class.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.#ctor(System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceResult class.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.#ctor(System.Object,Hawaii.Services.Client.Status)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceResult class.
member.param: Specifies the status of the service call.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.#ctor(System.Object,Hawaii.Services.Client.Status,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceResult class.
member.param: Specifies the status of the service call.
An exception instance used if an error occured during the service call.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.Exception
member.summary: Gets or sets the error exception.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.Status
member.summary: Gets or sets the status of the service call.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceResult.StateObject
member.summary: Gets or sets a user-defined object.

member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.HttpMethod
member.summary: Specifies the HTTP method that is used when communicating with the server.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.HttpMethod.Get
member.summary: Represents the Http Get method.

member.summary: Represents the Http Post method.

member.summary: Represents the Http Put method.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.HttpMethod.Delete
member.summary: Represents the Http Delete method.

member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1
member.summary: A base class for all Hawaii service agent classes. These agents are wrapping the communication tasks specific to each service. ServiceAgent provides functionality common to all these clases.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceAgent class.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.#ctor(Hawaii.Services.Client.HttpMethod,System.Object)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceAgent class.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.ProcessRequest(Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent{`0}.OnCompleteDelegate)
member.summary: This method initiates the asynchronous service call.
member.param: The on complete" callback that will be invoked after the service call completes.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.DeserializeResponse``1(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Deserializes the response stream.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.GetPostData
member.summary: This method must be implemented by all classes that inherit from ServiceAgent. It will provide the POST data that has to be sent to the service if the Http Method used is POST.
member.returns: Returns the POST data in byte array format.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.ParseOutput(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: This method is called after the response sent by the server is received by the client. It allows classes that inherit from ServiceAgent to do their own processing of the data received from the server.
member.param: The response stream containing response data that is received from the server.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.OnCompleteRequest
member.summary: A virtual method. It is invoked after completing the service request. The implementation of this base class will invoke the client's "on complete" callback method. Classes that inherit from ServiceAgent can oveerite this method to further process the service call result before calling the client's "on complete" callback method.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.RequestCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Callback method called after request.BeginGetRequestStream completes.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.ResponseCallback(System.IAsyncResult)
member.summary: Callback method called after request.BeginGetResponse completes.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.ConvertStatus(System.Net.HttpStatusCode)
member.summary: Method converts HttpStatusCode to Status.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.OnComplete
member.summary: Gets or sets OnComplete handler.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.Result
member.summary: Gets or sets service result.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.Uri
member.summary: Gets or sets service Uri.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.RequestMethod
member.summary: Gets or sets the HTTP method (GET, POST, PUT or DELETE).

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.ClientIdentity
member.summary: Gets or sets the client identity.

member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceAgent`1.OnCompleteDelegate
member.summary: OnCompleteDelegate delegate type definition.

member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The Hawaii.Services.Client provides common functionality for the client libraries classes that communicate over REST to Hawaii services.

member.name: T:Hawaii.Services.Client.Status
member.summary: Describes the status of a Hawaii service call.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.Status.Unspecified
member.summary: Defaut status code.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.Status.Success
member.summary: Specifies that the service call completed successfully.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.Status.InternalServerError
member.summary: Specifies that the service call completed with an internal server error.

member.name: F:Hawaii.Services.Client.Status.Error
member.summary: Specifies that the service call completed with an error.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ServiceUri class.
member.param: Specifies the host url. For example: http://ocr2.hawaii-services.net.

member.summary: A Helper method to add a query string key-value pair.
member.param: The key in the query string.
The value corresponding to the key.

member.name: M:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceUri.ToString
member.summary: Returns the service uri string.

member.summary: Gets or sets service host url.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceUri.Signature
member.summary: Gets or sets service's REST signature For Example : Service Url : http://hawaiispeech/SpeechRecognition Signature : SpeechRecognition Service Url : http://hawaiispeech/SpeechRecognition/GrammerName/ Signature : SpeechRecognition/GrammarName.

member.name: P:Hawaii.Services.Client.ServiceUri.Arguments
member.summary: Gets or sets arguments used for the Query String part of the Service Url.
